title: Top Places to visit in Markapur, Andhra Pradesh
content: Markapuram is a town in Prakasam district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and the headquarters of Markapur Mandal in Markapur revenue division.:16 Markapur is having one of the oldest chenna Kesava Swamy temple built by King Srikrishnadevaraya.
